languages.text: "Как любят говорить мои коллеги, невинность ничего не доказывает. Вы унаследовали не только славу и богатство Теодоры, но и ее ошибки".
"As my colleagues like to say, innocence proves nothing. You have inherited not just Theodora's glory and wealth, but her mistakes as well."
languages.original_text: "Как любят говорить мои коллеги, невинность ничего не доказывает. Вы унаследовали не только славу и богатство Теодоры, но и ее ошибки".

traits.locale_text: "As my colleagues like to say, innocence proves nothing. You have inherited not just Theodora's glory and wealth, but her mistakes as well."
"As my colleagues like to say, innocence proves nothing. You have inherited not just Theodora's glory and wealth, but her mistakes as well."
"As my colleagues like to say, innocence proves nothing. You have inherited not just Theodora's glory and wealth, but her mistakes as well."
"As my colleagues like to say, innocence proves nothing. You have inherited not just Theodora's glory and wealth, but her mistakes as well."
"As my colleagues like to say, innocence proves nothing. You have inherited not just Theodora's glory and wealth, but her mistakes as well."

languages.text: 「私の同僚の言葉を借りよう、無実は何の証拠にもならない。お前が受け継いだのはシオドーラの栄誉と富だけではない、その過ちも引き受けたのだ」
languages.original_text: "As my colleagues like to say, innocence proves nothing. You have inherited not just Theodora's glory and wealth, but her mistakes as well."

traits.locale_text: 「私の同僚の言葉を借りよう、無実は何の証拠にもならない。お前が受け継いだのはシオドーラの栄誉と富だけではない、その過ちも引き受けたのだ」

languages.original_text: "As my colleagues like to say, innocence proves nothing. You have inherited not just Theodora's glory and wealth, but her mistakes as well."

languages.text: “我的同僚常把一句话挂在嘴边：无辜不能证明清白。你不仅继承了西奥多拉的荣耀和财富，也继承了她愚蠢的错误。”
languages.original_text: "As my colleagues like to say, innocence proves nothing. You have inherited not just Theodora's glory and wealth, but her mistakes as well."

traits.locale_text: “我的同僚常把一句话挂在嘴边：无辜不能证明清白。你不仅继承了西奥多拉的荣耀和财富，也继承了她愚蠢的错误。”

languages.text: «Como suelen decir mis compañeros de profesión, la inocencia no demuestra nada. No solo ha heredado la gloria y la riqueza de Theodora, sino también sus errores».
languages.original_text: "As my colleagues like to say, innocence proves nothing. You have inherited not just Theodora's glory and wealth, but her mistakes as well."

traits.locale_text: «Como suelen decir mis compañeros de profesión, la inocencia no demuestra nada. No solo ha heredado la gloria y la riqueza de Theodora, sino también sus errores».

languages.text: « Comme mes collègues aiment à le dire, l'innocence ne prouve rien. Les erreurs de Théodora font partie de son héritage, au même titre que sa gloire et sa fortune. »
languages.original_text: "As my colleagues like to say, innocence proves nothing. You have inherited not just Theodora's glory and wealth, but her mistakes as well."

traits.locale_text: « Comme mes collègues aiment à le dire, l'innocence ne prouve rien. Les erreurs de Théodora font partie de son héritage, au même titre que sa gloire et sa fortune. »

languages.text: "Wie meine Kollegen immer sagen, Unschuld beweist gar nichts. Ihr habt nicht nur Theodoras Ruhm und Reichtum geerbt, sondern auch ihre Fehler."
languages.original_text: "As my colleagues like to say, innocence proves nothing. You have inherited not just Theodora's glory and wealth, but her mistakes as well."

traits.locale_text: "Wie meine Kollegen immer sagen, Unschuld beweist gar nichts. Ihr habt nicht nur Theodoras Ruhm und Reichtum geerbt, sondern auch ihre Fehler."

languages.text: "Meslektaşlarım sık sık şöyle der: 'Masumiyet hiçbir şeyi kanıtlamaz'. Theodora'nın yalnızca namını ve hazinesini miras olarak almadın, hatalarını da aldın."
languages.original_text: "As my colleagues like to say, innocence proves nothing. You have inherited not just Theodora's glory and wealth, but her mistakes as well."

traits.locale_text: "Çalışma arkadaşlarımın sık sık söylediği gibi: Masumiyet hiçbir şeyi kanıtlamaz. Theodora'nın yalnızca namını ve hazinesini miras olarak almadın, hatalarını da aldın."
